channel.title: ♣Zaron's isle dev team!♣
channel.description:
ok,i was supposed to release Zaron's isle V.2, but i decided not to :( too bad! I will though be making a server out of it (hamachi) and letting people on! (NOTE: when i first put it up, it'll only be on on like 3:00 P.M since it's just testing... So i need coders, testers, forum designers, etc...
Server coders: Almost full Stick of air (part time coder) Justin4143 EMPTY
Error fixers: Completely empty! EMPTY EMPTY EMPTY
Server testers: Full xxxxxx 13 tacoboyy fasih
Forum designers: Full Genjoi Zez1ma boy Stick Of air
Ok, here's the format if you would like the be 1 ^ above:
[code]1. Place you would like to try out for 2. Show examples, links, anything to show that you kow how to do that skill well :) 3. Why would you like to be one above?[/code]
Now just comment your app. in this post and i'll see if your good. You might get either MOD's rights or ADMIN's rights if your really good at what you do. (NOTE: ADMIN's right is the hardest thing to get besides owner, you must be able to do at leaste a difficulty lvl or 9 or above!!! IM SERIOUS!)
Plz comment your app. now so you can help out with a great server! :)

i thought i was getting paied i resighn
